Data: Clark to Misbah, no run legcutter, length ball outside off, came down the track and tried to drive it through the leg side, cut away to beat the outside edge, around 118 kmph
Clark to Misbah, no run teasing him outside off stump, defended towards cover
Clark to Misbah, no run good length outside off, gets forward and drops it short of cover
Clark to Misbah, no run back of a length, accurate again, drops it dead wide of the pitch
Clark to Misbah, 2 runs a touch fuller, outside off, moves front and across and flicks it away wide of square leg for a couple
Clark to Misbah, no run good length on the off, defended towards point
Hopes to Shehzad, 1 run short of a length on middle, worked away to deep square leg
Hopes to Misbah, 1 run slightly short on middle, tries to defend it off the back foot,.gets an inside edge behind square, gets a single
Hopes to Shehzad, 1 run really slow pitch this, slower one outside off, pushed wide of mid-on
Hopes to Misbah, no run slightly short on middle, tries to fend it away, is hit on the ribs and it rolls into the off side
Hopes to Misbah, no run good length on the off, defended off the front foot short of cover
Hopes to Misbah, no run short outside off, cut away but straight to point, we'll see many tidy overs today, anything in the range of 200 should be competitive
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run tossed it up, on the off stump, driven straight to midwicket
Hauritz to Shehzad, 2 leg byes on leg stump, tries to clip it fine, brushes his pads on its way wide of fine leg for a couple
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run tossed up on middle, pushed through to deep midwicket for a couple
Hauritz to Misbah, 2 runs two more, full on the off, bends low and paddles it wide of fine leg
Hauritz to Misbah, no run quicker one bowled short on the off, turned away to square leg
Hauritz to Misbah, no run spun back in sharply, got behind and tickled it square
Hopes to Shehzad, no run bowled at 129.2 kmph, flicked away to the short fine fielder

Hopes to Shehzad, no run slightly slower one, fullish on the off, almost sucked him in, bowled at 122.8 kmph, pushed through it, tried to chip it over the in-field but fortunately mistimed it, fell short of mid-off
Hopes to Shehzad, no run short of a length on middle, comes down the track and plays at it, gets an inside edge onto his pads
Hopes to Shehzad, no run on middle and off, taps it towards cover, no intent there
Hopes to Shehzad, no run fullish on the off stump, defended watchfully towards cover
Hopes to Shehzad, 1 run slower one on the off, punched short of mid-off to steal a quick single
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 leg bye on middle and off, tries to paddle it fine, didn't connect, lobbed up off his pads
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, swept to fine leg
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run good length outside off, spun back in to strike him outside the line, gets a run
Hauritz to Misbah, no run short outside off, gets back and drops it short of point
Hauritz to Misbah, 2 runs short on middle, whipped away wide of deep square leg for a couple
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run worked away into the leg side again but fine leg runs in to prevent the second
Hopes to Misbah, no run short of a length outside off, pushed towards point from the crease, played away from his body there
Hopes to Misbah, no run much straighter, bowled at 128 kmph, walks and defends it to midwicket
Hopes to Misbah, no run slower one, legcutter, at 112.5 kmph, defended into the off side
Hopes to Misbah, 1 run saw him coming down and dropped it short, fends it behind square for a single
Hopes to Shehzad, no run slower one on the off, plenty of those in this game, pushed off the front foot to Clarke at point
Hopes to Shehzad, no run short of a length on the off, pushed away to midwicket off the front foot
Hauritz to Misbah, no run flatter on the off stump and spinning in, defended back to the bowler
Hauritz to Misbah, no run gave it some air this time, defended cautiously on the pitch
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run full outside off, turned short of midwicket and scampered off for a single
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run short of a length on middle, paddled to square leg off the front foot
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run tossed up outside off, gets across and chips it just short of midwicket
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run had him interested for a bit there, got an inside edge onto his pads and lobbed up in front of Haddin who wasn't able to reach it
North to Misbah, no run loopy, on middle and leg, at <9>90 kmph, worked away to square leg
North to Misbah, 2 runs runs, finally, short and wide, rocks back and cuts it behind point for three runs, 50 up for Pakistan
North to Misbah, 1 run short on the off, punched off the back foot to long-on
North to Shehzad, 1 run a touch fuller, driven down the ground to long-on again
North to Misbah, no run tossed up outside off, leans forward and defends
North to Misbah, no run flighted outside off, spinning back in, chopped down to point off the back foot
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run thrown up outside off, pushed away wide of midwicket
Hauritz to Misbah, no run moves across to negate the spin, turned away to midwicket
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run flighted on middle, reaches forward and turns it wide of midwicket for a single again
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run gets forward and paddles it behind square leg for one more
Hauritz to Misbah, no run flatter, gets outside off to turn it away, rapped on the pads and rolls back to the bowler
Hauritz to Misbah, no run quicker one on the off, dabbed to midwicket off the front foot
North to Shehzad, 1 run loopy outside off, paddled again, a bit of strain that shot, and all that for a single
North to Misbah, no run short outside off and moving in, pushed back off the back foot
North to Misbah, no run tossed up outside off, Misbah, expecting it to spin back in played inside the line, missed as it went on straight
North to Misbah, 1 run shortish on middle, helped on its way to fine leg
North to Shehzad, no run quicker on the off stump, tapped to cover
North to Shehzad, 2 runs first signs of aggression, charges down and clears mid-off, not as well timed but earns a couple, still three-an-over
Hauritz to Misbah, no run short of a length on the off, defended into the leg side
Hauritz to Misbah, no run slightly flatter, and quicker outside off, pushed off the front foot to cover
Hauritz to Misbah, no run tossed up on the off stump, dropped short of midwicket, the crowd won't be liking this
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run quicker on middle and off, turned away wide of midwicket for a quick single
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run massive spin, shaped himself for a cut but ended up dabbing it just wide of the stumps
Hauritz to Shehzad, 2 runs nicely done, fetched it from outside off and drove it wide of long-on for a couple
North to Misbah, 1 run worked away wide of square leg
North to Shehzad, 1 run short outside off, gets back and bunts it to deep cover
North to Misbah, 1 run short on middle, pulled away to deep square leg
North to Shehzad, FOUR runs first boundary in almost 17 overs, slower through the air, short outside off, rocks back and punches it hard between long-off and deep cover, firmly struck
North to Shehzad, 1 run flighted outside off, pushed through to deep cover, nicely done
North to Misbah, no run thought of paddling it, but it was a little too wide, ended up dabbing it to point
Clarke to Shehzad, no run tossed up outside off, pushed straight to cover
Clarke to Shehzad, 1 run low full toss on the off stump, driven to long-off
Clarke to Misbah, FOUR runs poor ball, picking up now, short on middle, rocks back and pulls it powerfully between deep square leg and deep midwicket
Clarke to Misbah, no run tossed up on middle, lunges forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Clarke to Misbah, no run turned away into the leg side short of midwicket
Clarke to Misbah, no run full on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run quickish outside off, gets across and turns it away to midwicket
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run flighted outside off, comes down and pushes it down to long-on
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run easily done, runs coming a little easily now, driven down to long-on again
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run flighted on the off stump, pushed down the ground for one more
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run tossed up outside off, gets across and paddles it to fine leg
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run fetches it from the off stump and pushes it away to midwicket
Clarke to Misbah, no run beat the outside edge, short on the off and zipped away to beat the outside edge as he prodded at it
Clarke to Misbah, no run dipping into the right hander, full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Clarke to Misbah, no run flighted on the off, pushed off the front foot to cover

Clarke to Misbah, OUT plumb, tossed up on middle, went for the sweep after three dot balls, tried to get it behind square, it straightened, he missed and was struck on the back pad in line with the stumps. Bowden raised his finger immediately
Clarke to Malik, no run tossed up on the off stump, zips away, pushed to cover off the back foot
Clarke to Malik, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, driven down the ground wide of long-off to get off the mark
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run bowled flattish on the off stump, driven down to long-on
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run paddle it wide of fine leg, moved well across and helped it on its way
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run fullish on the pads, clipped to deep square leg for a single
Hauritz to Shehzad, 3 runs safe shot, plenty of gaps, came down the track and lofted it inside out over mid-off for three runs
Hauritz to Malik, 2 runs two more, tickled down wide of fine leg, Malik has done well in his brief stay
Hauritz to Malik, no run short outside off, spinning in, cut away to point
Clarke to Shehzad, no run flighted on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover

Clarke to Shehzad, 2 runs ooh, almost short on middle, came on really slow, stopped on him, went for the pull, was a little early into the shot, got the top edge and Bracken at deep square leg was a little slow getting off the mark and it fell just short of him as he came running in
Clarke to Shehzad, 1 run flighted outside off, pushes at it, thick outside edge wide of point
Clarke to Malik, 2 runs lands on middle, reaches forward and sweeps it between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a couple more
Clarke to Malik, 1 run
Clarke to Shehzad, no run beaten by the spin! Short, shaped himself for a cut, spun back in prodigiously to beat the outside edge, in fact, it went over the off stump
Hauritz to Malik, no run tossed up on the off stump, pushed off the front foot
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run short on middle, whipped away wide of midwicket for a single
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run gave it air, on the off stump, driven down to long-on
Hauritz to Malik, no run dropped, dipped in, short of a good length outside off, reached forward to defend, spun in sharply to brush the glove on the way to the keeper who fumbled it
Hauritz to Malik, no run
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards long-on for a single
Clarke to Malik, 2 runs tossed up outside off, driven firmly wide of deep cover for a couple to bring up the 100, Malik continues to impress
Clarke to Malik, FOUR runs tossed up outside off, bends low and sweeps it powerfully wide of deep square leg, takes off one hand after striking it cleanly
Clarke to Malik, 1 run pushed firmly down the ground to long-off
Clarke to Shehzad, 1 run back of a length, chopped down to deep cover of the back foot
Clarke to Malik, 1 run pushed away off the back foot wide of point for a single
Clarke to Shehzad, no run on middle and off, tries to work it away, is hand on the pads outside the line
Hauritz to Malik, no run Malik is lucky, shapes up for a sweep but not with much conviction, takes the top edge and drops just short of Hauritz
Hauritz to Malik, no run flighted on the off, pushed into the leg side
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run short of a length on middle, worked away off the back foot wide of midwicket
Hauritz to Shehzad, 1 run short of a good length outside off, guided wide of point for a single
Hauritz to Malik, no run tempted him with a flighted one outside off, pushed to cover
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run quicker through the air, on middle, tickled behind square for a single
Clark to Malik, 1 run short on middle, worked away to deep square leg for a single
Clark to Shehzad, 1 run short on middle, dabbed wide of point for a single
Clark to Malik, 1 run slower legcutter, tries to chop it down, gets an under-edge wide of Haddin for a single
Clark to Shehzad, no run short on middle and off, at 133.1 kmph, gets an inside edge wide of Haddin
Clark to Shehzad, no run slower one on the off, legcutter again, punched to cover
Clark to Shehzad, no run legcutter again, bowled at 120.4 kmph, worked away wide of midwicket, fails to squeeze in a single
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run short of a length on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on

Hauritz to Shehzad, 2 byes beats everything, slower through the air, just outside off and spun back in to beat him as he tried to work it away off the front foot, just missed the stumps and Haddin faied to collect
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run worked away off the front foot to square leg
Hauritz to Shehzad, no run tossed up outside off, dropped on the off side short of cover

Hauritz to Shehzad, OUT his patience was tested and finally, when offered some flight, failed to resist the temptation. Landed full on the off stump, went for a mighty slog-sweep over midwicket, it spun in, took the top-edge and stuck safely in the palms of Ferguson at long-on
Hauritz to Malik, no run tossed up on middle, pushed to mid-off
Clark to Afridi, no run good length on the off stump, defended just wide of short mid-on
Clark to Afridi, no run good length on middle, gets across and pushes it to mid-on
Clark to Afridi, 2 runs goes after it, just a fraction full and his eyes light up, chips it over mid-off, wide of deep cover for a couple
Clark to Afridi, no run back of a length on middle, defended into the leg side off the back foot
Clark to Afridi, 1 run slower one outside off, cutting away, defended to point off the back foot, it's just wide of him and they get a single
Clark to Malik, 1 run short on middle and leg, tickled wide of square leg for a single
Symonds to Malik, 1 run tossed up on the off, pushed back past Symonds who lets it through followed by midwicket and they allow them a single
Symonds to Afridi, 2 runs short outside off, moves across and turns it away wide of deep midwicket for a couple more
Symonds to Afridi, no run flighted outside off, paddled down to short fine
Symonds to Afridi, FOUR runs he's off, short outside off, tries to cut it past point, gets a thick outside edge to the third-man boundary, the crowd is up
Symonds to Afridi, 1 run short on the off stump, makes room and punches it down to deep cover
Symonds to Malik, 1 run full toss on the off stump, he looks determined here, remember is a full toss and he bunts it down to long-on
Clark to Malik, no run short of a good length on the off stump, defended with a straight bat off the back foot
Clark to Malik, 1 run slower one bowled full on middle, picked it up, drove it down the ground to long-on
Clark to Afridi, FOUR runs powerfully struck, legcutter again, took it on the half-volley and drilled it wide of long-off, he didn't have to cover much ground there but it raced away
Clark to Afridi, 2 runs on middle and leg, flicked away wide of deep square leg, a risky second but thrown at the wrong end, towards Malik at the non-striker's end
Clark to Afridi, no run legcutter, beaten this time, short of a good length outside off, fished for it, was almost done in by the movement
Clark to Afridi, FOUR runs four more, short outside off, played deliberately, it appeared that way, opened the face at the last moment to get it really fine wide of the keeper and a diving third man
Bollinger to Malik, no run good length outside off and shaping away, left alone to the keeper
Bollinger to Malik, OUT looked plumb, nipped back in from the off, he got forward to defend but was struck just in line, didn't get across enough and played with bat really close to pad
Bollinger to Kamran, 1 run yorker length outside off, full, dug out towards deep cover for a single
Bollinger to Afridi, no run short of a good length on the off, pushed off the front foot towards midwicket

Bollinger to Afridi, 4 runs came back in, just manages to get his bat down in time, gets an inside edge onto his pads, calls for a single, is sent back, but a little late, Clarke has a shy at the stumps but misses, and concedes overthrows, four of them, through the midwicket region. Would have been out had he scored a direct hit
Bollinger to Afridi, no run back of a length outside off, guided to cover
Clark to Kamran, no run beaten by the legcutter, bowled at 129.3 kmph, reached forward to defend but it spat away
Clark to Kamran, no run short on middle, defended off the back foot to the bowler
Clark to Kamran, no run coming back in, slightly short on leg stump, defended towards mid-on
Clark to Kamran, OUT kept low and pegged back the offstump, short of a good length bowled at 132 kmph, failed to get his bat down in time and timber!
Clark to Arafat, no run fullish outside off and moved away, left alone to the keeper
Clark to Arafat, no run on middle and leg, tries to fend it away, clips his thighs on the way to square leg
Bollinger to Afridi, no run 122.9 kmph, darting back in a touch, defended to point off the front foot
Bollinger to Afridi, no run cut away after landing on a good length on middle and off, defended in front of cover
Bollinger to Afridi, FOUR runs picked the length early, much quicker, bowled at 133.1 kmph, pulled it away wide of mid-on, didn't time it all that well, but well enough for it to reach the ropes
Bollinger to Afridi, 1 run bringing it back on, gets a thick inside edge wide of square leg, sticks to a single
Bollinger to Arafat, no run moved away, covered it well by getting across and pushing it to cover
Bollinger to Arafat, no run short of a length outside off, dropped short of point on the back foot
Clark to Afridi, no run full outside off, gets way outside the line to flick it towards square leg, is hit on the pads
Clark to Afridi, 2 runs fumble at third man, almost palms it to the ropes but gets it on the second attempt, just two taken, tried to work it away but got a thick edge as the ball cut away, lucky
Clark to Afridi, no run beaten, angling in from slightly wide of the crease and gets it to shape away after landing on a good length as he prods at it
Clark to Afridi, no run short of a good length outside off, held its line this time, left alone to the keeper
Clark to Afridi, 1 run short of a length on the off, punched wide of the bowler for a single
Clark to Arafat, no run probing him outside off, taps it towards cover, Arafat intent on giving his senior partner the strike
Bracken to Afridi, no run slightly short on middle and leg, pushed straight to midwicket
Bracken to Afridi, no run back of a length on the off, slow, at 110.4 kmph, dabbed short of point
Bracken to Afridi, 1 run slower one again, at 108.8 kmph, dropped short of point for a quick single
Bracken to Arafat, no run normal pace, around 130 kmph, driven straight to cover
Bracken to Arafat, 1 run slower one outside leg stump, turned to fine leg for a single
Bracken to Afridi, 1 run slower one bowled on a good length on leg stump, turned wide of deep square leg for a single to keep the strike
Clark to Afridi, no run short outside off, chops it down short of point, doesn't get hold at all
Clark to Afridi, 2 runs slower one on middle, picked it, drove it firmly wide of a diving midwicket for a couple, wristily done
Clark to Afridi, 1 bye short outside off, tries to swing it away over midwicket, misses, Haddin fumbles and they sneak a bye
Clark to Arafat, no run good length on the off, walks across and pushes it to mid-off
Clark to Arafat, no run short of a good length outside off and moves away, makes no contact as he fishes for it
Clark to Arafat, no run back of a length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Bracken to Afridi, no run back of a length on middle, dropped short of the bowler, decent pace, 131 kmph
Bracken to Afridi, 1 run slower offcutter, pushed wide of point for a single
Bracken to Arafat, no run slower ball bowled short of a good length outside off, tries to dab it past the keeper, can't beat him
Bracken to Arafat, no run short of a length outside off, kept a little low as he tried to chop it down, misses
Bracken to Arafat, no run keeping him quiet now, slower one again, tapped to cover, decides against the single

Bracken to Arafat, no run offcutter, appeal for caught-behind, there was certainly a deflection as he tried to drive it past the bowler, Haddin takes it bending low but Aleem Dar says no, we need a replay to confirm what happened

Bollinger to Afridi, OUT gone! Big wicket! Short on middle, gets more bounce and is pacy, bowled at 135 kmph, goes for a mighty pull, gets the top edge as it comes on a little too quickly and North takes an easy catch at mid-on
Bollinger to Arafat, FOUR runs straying on the pads, waits for it and clips it away really fine to the fine-leg boundary, important runs these
Bollinger to Arafat, no run back of a length on the off stump, dropped short of cover
Bollinger to Arafat, no run offcutter, tried to dab it down to third man, missed as it moved away
Bollinger to Arafat, no run slower one again, pushed at it off the front foot, missed and Haddin took it low, the bowler appealed but Haddin shook his head this time, saying there was no nick
Bollinger to Arafat, no run short of a good length on the off stump, punched to cover
Bracken to Tanvir, no run on middle and off, pushed into the leg side
Bracken to Tanvir, no run
Bracken to Tanvir, 1 run slower one bowled full outside off, driven to cover who fumbles to let them sneak single
Bracken to Arafat, 1 run slower one bowled full on middle and leg, worked away wide of midwicket

Bracken to Tanvir, 1 run slower offcutter, defended to point, an unnecessary throw to the striker's end, concedes an overthrow, Watson the culprit, he was also responsible for the misfield early in the over
Bracken to Arafat, no run slower one bowled short outside off, dabbed wide of point, decides against the single after calling for it
Bollinger to Tanvir, no run quick, bowled at 140.6 kmph, full on the off, pushed off the front foot to mid-off
Bollinger to Tanvir, no run short on leg stump, tries to flick it away, hit high on the pads and they squeeze a leg bye
Bollinger to Tanvir, 1 run full and wide, tries to drive hard, mistimes it between cover and cover-point for a single
Bollinger to Arafat, 1 leg bye short outside leg stump and cut back in, tried to shuffle and work it behind square, was struck on the pads and high
Bollinger to Tanvir, FOUR runs swung away hard, in the slot from Bolly, full on the middle, picked it and swatted it over midwicket in the vacant gap for a boundary
Bollinger to Tanvir, 1 run slower ball bowled short outside off, makes room and chops it down to third man
Bracken to Tanvir, no run pushed into the off side off the back foot
Bracken to Tanvir, no run
Bracken to Tanvir, 1 run dropped, Watson's having a terrible day, slower one, has a wild swing, gets the top edge and Watson, after getting under it nicely, drops a sitter
Bracken to Arafat, 1 run worked away behind square off the front foot

Bracken to Tanvir, OUT gone this time! Identical shot, gets the top edge again but is unfortunate it's not Watson under it again, got it much straighter and Hauritz at mid-on shows his team-mate how it's done
Bracken to Arafat, FOUR runs gets it in the gap, they are inching towards 200 now, on middle, swung away over midwicket to beat long-on and deep midwicket
Bollinger to Shoaib Akhtar, 2 runs short of a good length outside off, opens the face to guide it behind point and wide of third man for a couple
Bollinger to Shoaib Akhtar, OUT change of pace, slower outside off, tries to swat it over the bowler's head, gets the top edge and Clarke at point takes an excellent catch running backwards
Bollinger to Arafat, 1 run full on middle and leg, flicked away stylishly to deep square leg
Bollinger to Ajmal, OUT Bollinger gets five!! The legcutter, bowled at around 135 kmph, landed on a good length on middle and cut away to beat the bat and clip off stump

Australia struck at the right times. Misbah and Shehzad had led the recovery after two early wickets but Clarke then trapped Misbah in front. Malik looked in good touch, scoring at almost a run-a-ball, but was done in by Bollinger. And just when Afridi had gotten into his groove, and was ready to take off in the third powerplay, he skied one to mid-on.

Bolly leads the team off the field, after taking a five-for in just his second ODI. Australia have the clear edge, and Pakistan, who had got themselves into a decent position at 116 for 3, lost their last seven wickets for 81.

We are set for the Australian reply. They have bowled well to give themselves a shot at a series win here. Will they or won't they? How will Shoaib perform? Their openers are strolling out, the fielders have taken their positions. All set! Shoaib Akhtar to bowl. Two slips
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run short of a good length outside off, moved away, guided down to third man, a loosener bowled at 129.8 kmph
Shoaib Akhtar to North, no run teasing line outside off, bowled at 138.1 kmph, came back in just a touch, left alone
Shoaib Akhtar to North, 1 run starts off well, picking up pace, Shoaib, this was 141.2 kmph, clipped away to square leg, misfield, and a single
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run good length outside off and holds its line, left alone by Watson
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run almost dragged it on, the quickest ball of the over, at 144.9 kmph, came back in this time, hung his bat out, was lucky to get an inside edge onto his pads
Tanvir to Watson, no run zipped away, probing line outside off and Watson lets it go
Tanvir to Watson, no run shaping away there, a touch fuller, gets his foot forward and defends to cover
Tanvir to Watson, no run good length on and outside off, consistently getting some movement away from the bat, left alone
Tanvir to Watson, no run and again, lands on a driving length on the off stump and zips away, Watson chooses to leave it be
Tanvir to Watson, no run fishes for it this time and is beaten, short of a good length, tries to run it down but the movement again beats the outside edge
Tanvir to Watson, no run beaten, pretends to let go but is found out, tried to prod at it away from his body, but it moved away, excellent start from Tanvir

Shoaib Akhtar to North, no run beaten, bowled at 144.3 kmph, darted back in, landed outside off and moved back in sharply, he played inside the line to that one but had no clue about the pace or the swing
Shoaib Akhtar to Clarke, no run bowled from wide of the crease on middle, defended to cover
Shoaib Akhtar to Clarke, 1 run banged in short on middle, tucks it away behind square for a single
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, FOUR runs punished, excellent shot under pressure, short and wide at 143.3 k mph, slashes it away wide of point for a boundary
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run banged in short on the off from wide of the crease, at 145.3 kmph, defended to point off the back foot
Tanvir to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke is away, straying on the pads, flicks it away with absolute easy through square leg for a boundary, poor ball first up in a new over
Tanvir to Clarke, 2 runs coming round the wicket, at 136.5 kmph on middle and leg, too straight, pushed gently between midwicket and mid-on for two more
Tanvir to Clarke, no run angling in and he leaves it riskily, came back in just a touch and it went over the off stump, would have been an embarassing dismissal had the crashed into the stumps
Tanvir to Clarke, no run short of a good length on the off, punched back towards mid-on, did so solidly
Tanvir to Clarke, 1 run takes the outside edge, angling in and moved it away, dabbed at it, got a thick edge wide of slip to third man
Tanvir to Watson, 1 run short outside off, held its line this time, guided down to third man to keep the strike
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run good length on the off, bowled at 145 kmph, punched to Afridi at cover

Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run angling into the right hander, came forward to defend, rockets in at 146.6 kmph, came back in to strike him high on the thighs, Aleem Dar thinks he got an inside edge, we'll have to wait and see
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 2 runs on middle and off, dabs hard at it, gets it wide of square leg for a couple
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run short of a good length on the off, gets forward and defends it solidly to cover

Thats all we have from here folks. The series is sealed 3-1, but there is still a matter of a dead rubber on the 3rd of May. Join us then. Thanks for your feedback. Cheers!
Doug Bollinger is the Man of the Match for his five-wicket haul.

Australia have proven deserved winners after three consecutive wins while the promise shown by Pakistan, under adversity, in their victory in the first game, sadly for them, didn't reach its desired end. We'll get you the details from the presentation shortly.

Watson was a bit of contrast, particularly against spin, missing attempted pulls and cuts on numerous occasions but the presence of Clarke helped him, and he too gradually began to open up, getting periodic boundaries to ensure the Pakistanis could never sense a chance.

Clarke was rarely beaten early in his innings, and was particularly brilliant against spinners against whom he used his feet superbly. He charged down the track to anything that was pitched up, and nudged, tickled and dabbed his way to a determined century.

Australia were under pressure, down two wickets for just three runs. But Clarke and co were determined to finish the series off here, after that superb comeback in the previous game where Pakistan were on top for a good part of their innings.
A thumping in the end. 197 on this pitch, one felt, was still competitive but it took a lot of grit and concentration from both these batsmen to pull it off quite comfortably in the end.
Australia won by 8 wickets (with 34 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Doug Bollinger, AUS
